oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Resistenzeigenschaften von Freilandtomaten gegen Phytophthora infestans
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Finckh, M.R.
Butz, A.
Haase, R.
Hartmann, M.
Ngwe, C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Breeding, genetics and propagation
Vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Results of first laboratory tests indicated large differences in partial and race-specific resistance among ten tomato varieties. Field tests confirm the general pattern observed in the laboratory. This should allow for the selection of good parents for the combination of complementary resistance traits.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Finckh, M.R.; Butz, A.; Haase, R.; Hartmann, M. and Ngwe, C. (2005) Resistenzeigenschaften von Freilandtomaten gegen Phytophthora infestans. [Resistances of out-door tomatoes against Phytophthora infestans.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
